name: cilengkrang-web-wisata
description: Aplikasi Web Wisata Cilengkrang - TypeScript, React, Elysia, PostgreSQL

scripts.dev:all: npx concurrently -n "API,WEB" -c "green,blue" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.prisma:push: cd backend && bun prisma db push
scripts.setup: npm run docker:up && sleep 3 && npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:push

author: Muhammad Rizal Nurfirdaus
